configuration.title: Filemarks
configuration.saveBookmarksInProject.des: Save bookmarks in project's .vscode folder (true) or global storage (false)
configuration.navigateThroughAllFiles.de: Navigate through bookmarks across all files when jumping (true) or only within current file (false)
configuration.showBookmarkNotDefinedWarn: Show warning message when jumping to a bookmark number that doesn't exist
configuration.revealLocation.description: Where to position the cursor when jumping to a bookmark
